title: Children with special abilities
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Ivan Gaal
brief_description: This film explores curriculum strategies and organisational approaches which can meet the needs of children with special abilities. The school Principal, several teachers, a consultant and various children are interviewed. Two children, Emma (aged seven) and Campbell (aged ten), are featured to highlight the characteristics and learning needs of such children. Suitable for Tertiary/Teacher education.
